OOC: I figured I would post first before I decided if Tuscon would hit.
Nig=
htrazor still had that last move. Anyone do what you will and we will see
w=
hat happens :)

BIC:

Outside the Ark the battle is picking up speed, the M=
aximals bringing
everything they have to bear against the Predacons!

This =
is the scene that greets Wing Caliber and Quickstrike as they emerge
from t=
he Ark and into the combat - one of complete mayhem! Two of the most
powerf=
ul Predacons to date are moving against the Ark, Hydras and Cyclonus!
And t=
hey are not alone as Predacons of all sorts follow them, lending their
dest=
ructive energies to the battle!

Torca, as the highest ranking Maximal on t=
he field was attempting to bring
order to the chaos! HoweverTorca is blown =
his off his feet and sent
sprawling to the ground by a blast from Cyclonus.=
 The stalwart
Maximal continued giving orders as he attempted to return fir=
e.

=93Wing Caliber, Quickstrike!=94 Torca=92s booming voice echoed across =
the
communication channel. =93The automatic controls are offline, get the A=
rk door
closed. We don=92t want any of these pieces of scrap getting inside=
 the Ark!=94

Meanwhile Noctorro, Airhammer and Quicksilver did what they c=
ould to harass
the other fliers like Waspinator, Deepstryke and even Cyclon=
us while Bantor
entered the fray with a wild abandon as he leaped after Hyd=
ras, hoping to
distract him long enough to allow the others to come in.

Ku=
p's blasts are powerful as he attempted to fire at the sweeps as well.
Howe=
ver what he got in return was several shots from Scourge as he lined up
on =
the Autobot. "Foolish prey!" Scourge said as he came around for another
run=
, his auto canons opening fire on Kup!

Meanwhile as the sweeps came after =
Nightshift and Ratrap, Nightshift
transformed into his SUV mode and began z=
ipping through enemy fire hoping to
dodge the well aimed blasts of the swee=
ps. However the sweeps are designed
to capture pray, and so as Nighshift pi=
cks up speed, the sweeps quickly
oblige the Maximals by firing sizzling hot=
 disintegration beams at them as
they fly after them!

INSIDE THE ARK:

> <=
OLD>
>
> Elita noded and Took ramulus's hand, she was unusually quiet.

<NE=
W>

Ramulus looked at Elita, =93I will protect you. I promise. Your father =
has to
defend the Ark.=94

Meanwhile Rodimus gave Elita one last squeeze an=
d then transformed. With a
screeching noise Rodimus took off for the front =
door. It was time to join
the battle in earnest!


Meanwhile at the same ti=
me Tuscon was still continuing his search, using his
sonar to attempt to lo=
cate the intruder. A small blip appeared on his
screen, alerting him to the=
 possible location of the intruder. Long years of
stealth training are read=
ying him for this moment as he moves forward,
trying to listen for the smal=
lest sound, feeling for the smallest vibration.
Unfortunately Tuscon=92s ar=
mor is heavier than it once was, slowing him. While
he is far more durable =
than he once was, moving silently and stealthily is
not an easy task, espec=
ially with his injuries. But he took his moment to
ready himself . . .

> <=
OLD>
>
> "Steady Straight Shot. We need to make this count."
>
> Straight S=
hot programs her mechanisms for optimal effeciency.
>
> " Talk about a shot=
 in the dark. Okay, let's do this."

<NEW>

Even as Tuscon uttered those wo=
rds he could hear a small whisper from
somewhere in the dark. =93AHH yes, t=
he wave is gone . . . FINALLY!=94

The blip disappeared from Tuscon=92s scr=
eens . . .

(TAG)

Preston

--20cf307d03e2bf718a049f2a81ff
